data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Pursuant to Provisions of Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform the stock exchange that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on August 21 2025 has considered and approved the following: 1. Re-appointment of Mr. Vidip Jatia (DIN: 06720329) as Managing Director of the Company w.e.f. May 13 2026 for a term of 5 years and 2. Re-appointment of Mrs. Namita Jatia as Whole time Director of the Company w.e.f February 14 2026 for a term of 5 years.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On August 21 2025 Filed In Accordance With The SEBI (Listing Obligations And
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on August 21 2025 has considered and approved following: 1. Re-appointment of Mr. Vidip Vinod Jatia (DIN:06720329) as Managing Director w.e.f May 13 2026 for a term of 5 years 2. Re-appointment of Mrs. Namita Prateek Jatia (DIN:07660840) as Whole time Director w.e.f. February 14 2026 for a term of 5 years 3. Approval of the Draft Directors Report and Annexures thereto for the Financial Year 2024-25 4. Convening of 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company and 5. Appointment of Scrutinizer for 43rd Annual General Meeting.

1. Appointment of Mr. Ashok Chhabildas Shah (DIN: 00077889) as an Additional Non- executive and Independent Director of the Company w.e.f. 7th April 2025.

2. Re-appointment of Mr. Romie Shivhari Halan (DIN: 02816976) as Non-executive Independent Director w.e.f. 25th August 2025 for second consecutive term of five years.

data.caption: Intimation About Listing And Trading Approval Received From The National Stock Exchange Of India Limited ("NSE").
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that the Company has received Listing and Trading approval vide letter NSE/LIST/185 dated 31st January 2025 from NSE Limited for its 38646853 Equity Shares of face value Rs.10/- each fully paid up.

The Company shall be Listed and Admitted to dealing on NSE Limited with effect from 03rd February 2025 under the NSE symbol "SUPREME". 

Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Listing Approval received from the NSE Limited.

data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the name of the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (RTA) of the Company has changed from Link Intime India Private Limited to MUFG Intime India Private Limited with effect from 31st December 2024.

The address and other contact details of the RTA currently remain unchanged and are available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) 2015
data.news_body: We are pleased to inform you that the construction work has officially commenced on the land acquired by the Company for the development of Final Plot No. 283, admeasuring 2280 square meters, located at Village Chipale, Taluka Panvel, District Raigad, Maharashtra.The land parcel is part of Town Planning Scheme 02 of the Navi Mumbai Airport Influence Notified Area (NAINA), managed by the City and Industrial Development Corporation of Maharashtra (CIDCO)

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E 25.05.2022
data.news_body:
We hereby inform the Exchange that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. 25th May, 2022 has, inter alia, considered and approved the following businesses:

1. Approval of Financial Results:
a) Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 attached as 'Annexure I';
b) Auditor''s Report in respect of the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022 attached as 'Annexure II' and
c) Declaration for unmodified opinion in respect of Audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022 attached as 'Annexure III'

2. Appointment of Secretarial Auditor
3. Appointment of M/s. M J S P & Associates, Chartered Accountants (FRN: 147743W) as an Internal Auditor of the company

data.news_body:

2.Reappointment of Mr. Srichandra Narayanaswamy Atreya (DIN: 01864119) as Non-Executive Independent Director:
